com.pile_drive.drivecommand.model.ev3
クラス ByteCodeFormatter

java.lang.Object
  com.pile_drive.drivecommand.model.ev3.ByteCodeFormatter

public class ByteCodeFormatter
extends java.lang.Object

EV3 Byte Code Formatter. This class make a byte array which is used as a byte code to control EV3 with Android. The command has some additional data to tell the type of previous byte data to EV3.

バージョン:
1.0 21-Dec-2013
作成者:
Tatsuya Iwanari
